OOC: No, no, no.  Beast Wars 2 was one of many Japanese series that never 
came over here.  Ya see, after the Japanese had shown the first season of 
Beast Wars, they hadn't yet gotten episodes from season two and three, so 
they showed 2 filler series while they were waiting.  In 1998, the Beast Wars 
2 cartoon came out in Japan with a new set of Cybertrons and Destrons facing 
off on the planet Gaea for something called Angolmois energy.  The Cybertron 
leader was Lioconvoy, a lion, and the leader of the Destrons was a new 
Galvatron, who was a dragon.  All the other toys were repaints of Beast Wars, 
Generatrion 2, and even Generation 1 toys.  There was kind of a "nature 
versus technology" theme in the show quite similar to what Beast Machines 
would later do, with the "good guys" being animals and the "bad guys" being 
vehicles.  In case you were wondering, the next year they did Beast Wars NEO.

--part1_7c.1d8eb7df.290b1998_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
